attributes.action: Reduce the state pension age to 60 Due to COVID19 Virus.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s our national Insurance Contributions we have paid .
So we should have the choice or not to take our pension out after 60 years old .
As we are at a higher risk of death from the virus health issues  before age 66 now  .
attributes.background:
Let the over 60s have the Option of taking out There government pension earlier then age 66 years old .
As we now have this virus.
More Vulnerable to being exposed in getting this virus  while being at work after the lock  down stops..

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302965

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
